statements: SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC, total_amount ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT customer_name, order_date, shipping_address FROM orders ORDER BY order_id
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, shipping_address FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 500 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Johnson%' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT order_id, shipping_address, total_amount FROM orders WHERE customer_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY order_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT item_name, price FROM Items WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, item_id FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT order_id, shipping_date FROM Shipping ORDER BY shipping_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM Items WHERE item_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT order_id, item_id, customer_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM Items WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, item_id, customer_id, order_date, shipping_date FROM Orders o JOIN Shipping s ON o.order_id = s.order_id WHERE o.order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY shipping_date ASC;
SELECT item_name, price, order_date FROM Items i JOIN Orders o ON i.item_id = o.item_id ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(price) AS total_order_cost FROM Orders o JOIN Items i ON o.item_id = i.item_id GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_order_cost > 1000 ORDER BY total_order_cost DESC;

SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM Orders;

SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products;

SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_address FROM Customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT order_date, customer_id, product_id FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, order_id, shipping_date, destination_address, shipping_cost FROM shipments WHERE shipping_cost < 30;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE weight > 5;
SELECT order_id, order_date, product_id FROM orders JOIN shipments ON orders.order_id = shipments.order_id;
SELECT customer_name, address, city, product_name, price FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;

SELECT product_name, category FROM Product WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM ShippingPattern GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT transport_mode, transport_capacity, transport_cost FROM Transportation WHERE transport_capacity >= 50 ORDER BY transport_cost ASC;
